transcript: you're competing against people who've had like 20 years just doing this thing it's kind of like this weird balance that you have to carry of like I'm smart enough and I'll work harder than all these other guys but I also have to respect the fact that they've been doing it for a long time and my quote novel idea they might have tried 10 years ago and there was an obvious reason it didn't work a Big Slice of Humble Pie will pay dividends
